page.title: 09GAMES CHILDREN PLAY
page.content: At school we play many games at break- time.Here are some of them. CHAIN CATCH. Two people are hit.They hold hands and the others run off.After counting to 20 they chase the others.When one is caught they join up but when another is caught there are two pairs. RUN ACROSS In run across again 2 people are hit.There is a line at the bottom of the play ground and they stand there.On either side of the play ground there are boxes in which the others stand.The object of the game is to run across to each square.The people who are hit try to hit you.The last people to be hit are hit next time that it is played.
